comment: I just do not get what it is about deviant art , but I get so many rando dudes sending me notes trying to give me advice on like the work I do , and like how to self publish , and like " here's an opportunity to make some MONEY on what you do like " I don't know you & I do that

comment: Even if it's just comments on art . I once had a guy try to lecture me on self publishing b / c he was looking into it himself , and this was after I'd run kickstarters and published the books on my own . He then yelled at me for not putting that where he could see it ^ _ ^ ; ;
